description: Emergency Supply of Equipment to Electricity Sector in Iraq and Support to Essential Humanitarian Services

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description: Provide training on systems planning and network construction to strengthen the capacity of the Ministry of Electricity, provide materials for repair work to provide electricity to the port and provide ancillary equipment to hospitals/health facilities and pumping stations
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Equipment toElectricity Sector

title: Emergency Supply of Equipment to Electricity Sector
